title: White chocolate, cranberry and walnut fudge
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon butter', '550g white chocolate chips', '1 (397g) tin sweetened condensed milk', '75g butter', '2 teaspoons rum flavouring', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg, or to taste', '120g dried cranberries', '120g walnut pieces']
